Mod.name: Noitavania
Mod.description:
Noitavania is a vanilla-friendly map expansion project that fills once empty space with new and expanded biomes, providing a metroidvania-like world experience.

[h1]What does this mod do?[/h1]
[list][*] Opens up the map with more inter-biome connectivity.
[*] Greatly expands previously empty areas with new (From across the modding community and I) and returning biomes.
[*] Adds additional secrets and rewards across the map.
[*]Adds a sprawling Nightmare/NG+ map alternative, with an almost entirely different approach to the map design. (*Really* departed from vanilla)
[*]Adds mini-temples to the expanded side areas to encourage and reward the brave explorer.
[*]Adds a new mini-boss with custom sprites, found deep in the new Castle biome. (more mini-bosses to come!)[/list]

New biomes added:
Sewers, Storage Depot, Cryo-Storage,
Volcano, Space, Toxic Dump,
Cursed Tunnel, Dark Castle, Hive,
Forgotten Tunnels, Ruined Bunker and more on the way.
